Last time on Sailing La Vaga, We headed down the west coast of Corsica a place we could Have easily spent an entire Summer alone
But as always we are bound by the weather and meeting people in new locations
We were heading south to dodge a fierce blow from the west and to meet our patrons Destiny and James in the north of Sardinia
We left this gorgeous anchorage this morning, our next stop on our way down would be a Ajaccio the capital city of Corsica

Napoleon bonaparte also Known as Napolean The first Was a French Military leader and Emperor Who conquered Much of Europe in The Early 19th
Century Born on the Island of corsica
Napoleon Rapidly rose Through The Ranks of the Military during the french revolution after Seizing political Power in france in a
1799 coup d'etat he Crowned Himself emperor in 1804 Shrewd ambitious and a Skilled Military
strategist Napoleon Successfully Waged War Against Various coalition's of European notions and Expanded His empire
However after a disastrous French Invasion of Russia in 1812 Napoleon abdicated The Throne Two Years Later and Was Exiled to the island of Elba
Which is Just Over there in
1815 he briefly returned to power in his Hundred Days Campaign after a Crushing Defeat at The battle of waterloo
abdicated Once Again and Was Exiled to the remote Island of st
Helena Where he died at Age 51
